short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension Werkzeugbox is a small tool that helps you to get displayed useful information and use small tools in your Browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension Werkzeugbox is a small tool that helps you to get displayed useful information and use small tools in your Browser.

Free tools:
- Screen information
- Mouse information (position, buttons clicked,...)
- Monitor information

Premium features:
- HTML meta tag analyzer
- HTML tag tree
